name: 3D Flappy Bird (Dev Whale)
description:
3D Bird Game Haha

This is the game Flappy Bird - loved by many, with an interesting twist put on it. This game follows the same basic controls, except it takes place in a 3D world.

Fly between the pipes, and try not to crash!

Controls:

Mouse left click, or space bar to flap/jump.

Use mouse to look around.

Visit my YouTube channel to watch how I made this game! YouTube Channel Link
